title: "IBM says U.S. should adopt new export controls on facial recognition systems"
excerpt: "IBM Corp <IBM.N> said on Friday the U.S. Commerce Department should adopt new controls to limit the export of facial recognition systems to repressive regimes that can be used to commit human rights violations."
